comment: Good professor. Quizzes due thursdays and tests+writing assignments(pretty easy) due sunday

Such a great and engaging professor. Makes complex concepts seem so easy and so miniscule. You will have to put in effort to study for the tests and get the readings done on time. He will give a warning the class before a reading quiz and he is so helpful!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Group projects--Gives good feedback

comment: He's funny and truly wants the best for his students. The exams are really easy IF you actually do the reading.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Beware of pop quizzes--Caring

comment: Great professor, makes lectures fun. The weekly quizzes can be a bit hard but the tests are easy as long as you go over the study guides. Attendance mandatory though, and he will fail you if you miss 12+ classes. Very fair teacher though, and some extra credit but not a whole lot. I would take him again and be happy with it.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Amazing lectures --Beware of pop quizzes
